txt.en: 'There is a great wounded salamander to the north of here that has been stricken with this dangerous affliction. Healing it will help not only the beast itself, but also ensure its many young are protected from this scourge.\n\n'Will you go and heal this beast?'
Return to Elder Ilaya in Khûtra
Administer the salve to Nekarkul on the shore to the west
Elder Ilaya has asked you to heal a large wounded salamander with the salve given to you by Heshra. The beast can be found west of Khûtra.
There is a large wounded salamander that needs to be healed with the salve given to you by Heshra, the herbalist. The salamander can be found west of Khûtra.

'Let that be a lesson to you. Nature gives no quarter, and expects none in return. A wounded beast is still savage, and nature only recognizes strength and ferocity. Fortunate, then, that its ferocity was more than matched by yours.'
'You need to save this beast and its young. The quicker the better, hurry!'
Elder Ilaya has asked you to heal a large wounded salamander with the salve given to you by Heshra. The beast can be found west of Khûtra.
Return to Elder Ilaya in Khûtra.
